description:
KeePass Early Update Check is a plug-in for [_KeePass 2.x_](http://www.KeePass.info) which lets you perform a KeePass update check BEFORE opening a database and automatically update plugins.
___
### [choco://keepass-early-update-check](choco://keepass-early-update-check)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)
___
**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/Rookiestyle/EarlyUpdateCheck/blob/master/readme.md)**
author: Rookiestyle
